description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. The short but challenging adventure is mostly a beat 'em up formula with a few platformer elements. There's also minion adventure where players can join in as enemies to defeat you.  If you enjoy the fighting or simply need a bit of pratice, battle mode would be the mode of choice. There are 3 modes leaving players clawing their way to victory and 2 team modes on a total of 8 stages.
